purpose: To automate security testing and vulnerability discovery in applications through fuzzing and proxying
principle: Utilizes fuzzing methodologies to test applications for security vulnerabilities by sending unexpected or random data inputs
reusability: Can be integrated into existing security workflows, supports custom fuzzing configurations, and provides extensibility through plugins
limitations: May require significant configuration for specific applications, potential false positives in vulnerability detection

highlight: Integrates advanced fuzzing techniques for security testing and vulnerability discovery
